name: Xbox 360 User Interface File
summary: Learn about .XUI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XUI files are actually compiled into binary .XUR files, which are the UI files used by the Xbox.

description: Skin file used by "modded" Xbox 360 game consoles; created and edited by the Xbox UI Tool, which is part of Microsoft's Xbox SDK; saves graphics and layout information for the dashboard; used for customizing the look and feel of the Xbox interface.
